review_1: Idk what this genre is but u hold a little aerial fighter and move it with your hand like a toy, dodging and shooting enemies. Gets very challenging, flow state almost feels like a kind of Tai chi. Very cool. If you like yuki play this game and if you like this play yuki.
review_2: Visit linktr,ee/gaving7095 for 25 % off many Oculus titles üòÄ This is a fun shooter which gets you moving about, fairly priced. I only don‚Äôt give it 5 stars because, to me, it was limited lifespan & not much incentive to replay.
review_4: Games awesome, it's like a VR Space Invaders or 1945. Really don't have many complaints, it's challenging enough that you won't just easily run through it first attempt, but easy enough that it isn't frustrating. However, it's really lacking on levels, a few good hours into the game and you will just be replaying the same thing over and over.
review_5: Love this game. So much fun. The graphics are funny and the gameplay is very challenging, even on the easiest level. Don‚Äôt hesitate. Get this!
